Name: Immovable
Des: Immune to hit and control effects.

Des: Recovers up to 0.1% HP per second.

Des: Increases Attack Frequency by 66% and has a 30% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Bomb
Des: A bomb left after death that deals 45% Physical DMG.

Name: Bomb
Des: A bomb left after death that deals 60% Physical DMG.

Name: Rigid Body
Des: Takes 1 damage only from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 6 times, and is resumed 8s later.

Name: Rigid Body
Des: Takes 1 damage only from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 9 times, and is resumed 8s later.

Name: Rigid Body
Des: Takes 1 damage only from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking damage 12 times, and is resumed 8s later.

Name: Barrier
Des: Receives a permanent shield equal to 15% of current HP, granting immunity to attacks. Once exhausted, it will deactivate. Reactivates in 15s.

Name: Barrier
Des: Receives a permanent shield equal to 25% of current HP, granting immunity to attacks. Once exhausted, it will deactivate. Reactivates in 15s.

Name: Barrier
Des: Receives a permanent shield equal to 35% of current HP, granting immunity to attacks. Once exhausted, it will deactivate. Reactivates in 15s.

Name: Radiation
Des: Continuously deals 6% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Des: Continuously deals 8% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Des: Continuously deals 10% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Radiation
Des: Continuously deals 1.25% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Closed Loop
Des: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 30% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Closed Loop
Des: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 45% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Closed Loop
Des: Increases Extra DMG Reduction by 60% against long-ranged attacks.

Name: Blessing
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 10%.

Name: Blessing
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 20%.

Name: Blessing
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 30%.

Name: Lone Wolf
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times based on the fewer number of nearby allies.

Name: Lone Wolf
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Stacks up to 10 times on the fewer number of nearby allies.

Name: Lone Wolf
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times based the on fewer number of nearby allies.

Name: Commander
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times based on the higher number of nearby allies.

Name: Commander
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Stacks up to 10 layers based on the higher number of nearby allies.

Name: Commander
Des: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times based on the higher number of nearby allies.

Name: Penetration
Des: Damaging a target also reduces its Extra DMG Reduction by 3%, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Penetration
Des: Damaging a target also reduces its Extra DMG Reduction by 4%, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Penetration
Des: Damaging a target also reduces its Extra DMG Reduction by 5%, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Lightning Shield
Des: When attacked, there is a 15%-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 20% Lightning DMG. 3s cooldown. Trigger chance increases the farther the target.

Name: Lightning Shield
Des: When attacked, there is a 15%-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 25% Lightning DMG. 2.5s cooldown. Trigger chance increases the farther the target.

Name: Lightning Shield
Des: When attacked, there is a 15%-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 30% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown.Trigger chance increases the farther the target.

Name: Wave
Des: Creates a shockwave upon getting up, repelling nearby enemies.

Name: Lightning Mine
Des: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Lightning Mine
Des: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 20% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Lightning Mine
Des: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 25% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Invisibility
Des: When visible, it will gain invisibility after 5s. If it is hit, it loses invisibility, and it must wait for 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Invisibility
Des: When visible, it will gain invisibility after 3s. If it is hit, it loses invisibility, and it must wait for 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Invisibility
Des: When visible, it will gain invisibility after 1s. If it is hit, it loses invisibility, and it must wait for 3s to reactivate it.

Name: Flash
Des: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 8-10s cooldown. Cooldown is reduced the farther the distance travelled.

Name: Flash
Des: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 7-9s cooldown. Cooldown is reduced the farther the distance travelled.

Name: Flash
Des: Teleports near the target when they are far away. 6-8s cooldown. Cooldown is reduced the farther the distance travelled.

Name: Transfer
Des: Teleport away when close to the target (8s cooldown). Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Transfer
Des: Teleport away when close to the target (7s cooldown). Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Transfer
Des: Teleport away when close to the target. 6s cooldown. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Division
Des: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 30% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Division
Des: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 60% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Division
Des: Summons two Clones of the same type that inherit 100% ATK and DEF upon dying.

Name: Black Hole
Des: Periodically leaves a black hole with weak gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Black Hole
Des: Periodically leaves a black hole with moderate gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Black Hole
Des: Periodically leaves a black hole with strong gravitational pull at your location.

Name: Laser
Des: Periodically unleashes lasers in the eight cardinal directions, dealing 3% continuous Physical DMG.

Name: Laser
Des: Periodically unleashes lasers in the eight cardinal directions, dealing 4% continuous Physical Damage.

Name: Laser
Des: Periodically unleashes lasers in the eight cardinal directions, dealing 5% continuous Physical Damage.

Name: Flame
Des: Attacks deal an additional 10% Fire DMG and have a 10% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 10% Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Des: Attacks deal an additional 15% Fire DMG and have a 15% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 15% Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Des: Attacks deal an additional 20% Fire DMG and have a 20% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Freeze
Des: Attacks deal an additional 10% Ice DMG, slow down the Target's Movement Speed by 15%, and have a 10% chance to Freeze for 0.3s.

Name: Freeze
Des: Attacks deal an additional 15% Ice DMG, slow down the Target's Movement Speed by 20%, and have a 15% chance to Freeze for 0.5s.

Name: Freeze
Des: Attacks deal an additional 20% Ice DMG, slow down the Target's Movement Speed by 25%, and have a 20% chance to Freeze for 0.7s.

Name: Shadow
Des: Attacks deal an additional 10% Dark DMG and have a 10% chance to stun the target for 0.5s. Takes 10% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Shadow
Des: Attacks deal an additional 15% Dark DMG and have a 15% chance to stun the target for 0.7s. Takes 15% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Shadow
Des: Attacks deal an additional 20% Dark DMG and have a 20% chance to stun the target for 0.9s. Takes 20% extra Dark DMG.

Name: Thunderous
Des: Attacks deal an additional 10% Lightning DMG and have a 10% chance to channel lightning, striking the target area once every 1.5s for 1.5s.

Name: Thunderous
Des: Attacks deal an additional 15% Lightning DMG and have a 15% chance to channel lightning, striking the target area once every 1.5s for 3s.

Name: Thunderous
Des: Attacks deal an additional 20% Lightning DMG and have a 20% of chance to channel lightning, striking the target area once every 1.5s for 4.5s.

Name: Cold Trail
Des: Unleash an Ice Block that tracks the target, dealing 5% Ice DMG upon contact. Tracking speed increases the farther the target.

Name: Cold Trail
Des: Unleash an Ice Block that tracks the target, dealing 10% Ice DMG upon contact. Tracking speed increases the farther the target.

Name: Cold Trail
Des: Unleash an Ice Block that tracks the target, dealing 15% Ice DMG upon contact. Tracking speed increases the farther the target.

Name: Deterioration
Des: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 30% for 3s.

Name: Deterioration
Des: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 45% for 4s.

Name: Deterioration
Des: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 60% for 5s.

Name: Null Heal
Des: Periodically make the target unable to receive any healing effects for 3s.

Name: Null Heal
Des: Periodically make the target unable to receive any healing effects for 4s.

Name: Null Heal
Des: Periodically make the target unable to receive any healing effects for 5s.

Name: Imprison
Des: Creates a barrier at the target location that lasts for 3s, blocking targets from entering or leaving. 15s cooldown.

Name: Imprison
Des: Creates a barrier at the target location that lasts for 4s, blocking targets from entering or leaving. 16s cooldown.

Name: Imprison
Des: Creates a barrier at the target location that lasts for 5s, blocking targets from entering or leaving. 17s cooldown.

Name: Invasion
Des: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other Damage Affix effects for 3s.

Name: Invasion
Des: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other Damage Affix effects for 4s.

Name: Invasion
Des: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers other Damage Affix effects for 5s.

Name: Backfire
Des: Generates an energy shield for 3s that deals 15% Physical DMG to targets. 16s cooldown.

Name: Backfire
Des: Generates an energy shield for 4s that deals 25% Physical DMG to targets. 17s cooldown.

Name: Backfire
Des: Generates an energy shield for 5s that deals 35% Physical DMG to targets. 18s cooldown.

Name: Diffusion
Des: Enemy attacks will remove 1 Signal Orb. When the enemy dies, it returns all Signal Orbs.

Name: Healing
Des: Heals the HP of the enemy's nearby allies equal to its ATK every 20s.

Name: Grudge
Des: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it will permanently receive 20% more DMG. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Revenge
Des: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it will receive 50% more DMG (unstackable).

Name: Burning Fire
Des: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it restore 20% HP.

Name: Protection
Des: Grants the enemy and its nearby allies a shield equal to 10% of its current HP every 10s. Shields granted this way cannot be stacked.

Name: Sacrifice
Des: Randomly selects 1 ally as a protected target. When the protected target dies, sacrifice itself to revive the target to full HP.

Name: Self-Destruction Bug
Des: Periodically summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug to attack the enemy.

Name: Devour
Des: Kills 1 nearby ally every 30s to restore 20% HP.

Name: Soul Devourer
Des: Increases ATK by 20% for each dead ally. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Curse
Des: Permanently reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction by 15% upon death.

Name: Curse
Des: Permanently reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction by 20% upon death.

Name: Curse
Des: Permanently reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction by 25% upon death.

Name: Purify
Des: Removes all your [Curses] upon death.

Name: Mourn
Des: When being killed, all enemies within a certain area will become unable to attack for 10s.

Name: Mourn
Des: When being killed, all enemies within a certain area will become unable to attack for 15s.

Name: Mourn
Des: When being killed, all enemies within a certain area will become unable to attack for 20s.

Name: Shield
Des: Gains a shield that can withstand DMG for 1/2/3 time(s) every 20s. The shield needs to have special effects when it exists.

Name: Shield
Des: Gains a shield that can withstand DMG for 1/2/3 time(s) every 20s. The shield needs to have special effects when it exists.

Name: Shield
Des: Gains a shield that can withstand DMG for 1/2/3 time(s) every 20s. The shield needs to have special effects when it exists.

Name: Bond
Des: Revives and restores 15% of max HP 10s after death if there are still enemies with an affix [Bond] alive.
